Text: so when is the next rip ?
The person who's account I was using stopped renewing his membership, it might be a while before I release an update.
ah well, it was cool for the time it last

Since it will take a while before you can release an update, would it be possible to (7-)zip your rips and upload them somwhere?
That way you it would be much easier to share it and people wouldn't rely on seeders.
